text: Walking a tightrope Hi I m not sure where to start  not really good at expressing how I feel aha  I m  M and was diagnosed with Type   Bipolar Disorder just before I started Year   when I was   Since then  I ve felt it hard to control my emotions For years I ve put myself through a bunch of bullshit and put up with so much fuckery that has just reduced me to a state of turmoil and I m not sure where to go anymore  I ve abused drugs  seen friends overdose and die and been subject to beatings at the hands of my Mother s partner for the last   years of my life  with him telling me that my friends will leave me and that I ll never amount to anything repeatedly  I have no confidence in myself and my abilities  I can t hold a job  and I m losing the passion I once had for writing and reading   Every time my mood shifts my thoughts go to committing suicide and planning how to do so  I ve self harmed quite a few times and attempted twice  I ve never gone through with it because I ve always thought about how my friends would feel if I did  But recently I ve felt myself growing more apathetic  almost like I don t care how they d feel anymore  I find it kind of scary but at the same time  for the first time  I feel like I could really go through with it   I find it incredibly hard to talk about my feelings   I don t think I d ever tell my friends how I really feel  I always act like I m okay around them but sometimes they ll see my self harm scars or bruises from where I ve been beaten down and I ll try to change the subject  I don t know why  it s just instinct at this point   So  yeah  I m not really sure what I m trying to get out of this  I guess I just needed to let someone know   Thank you for reading
summary: M was diagnosed with Type Bipolar Disorder and struggles to control his emotions. He has abused drugs, seen friends overdose and die and was subject to beatings at the hands of his mother's partner. He can't hold a job and he's losing the passion for writing and reading. He's self harmed a few times and attempted suicide twice. He finds it hard to talk about his feelings with his friends.

text: A group of teenagers ridiculed me yesterday  I ve hit too many low points in these last couple of weeks Groups of teenage girls still scare me and make me feel self conscious And I m in my late  s Yesterday was payday for me and I always eat out on payday  I decided to get carry out from my favorite Shawarma place yesterday evening after picking up my medication My self esteem has been exceptionally low these past couple of weeks  I m dealing with a lot of health problems right now  I literally have no one to reach out to in terms of friends and family and have been ghosted by a lot of people who I thought cared about me  I am awaiting a cancer prognosis  etc  etc  I ve also gained weight recently  I just feel like shit all around and I feel like if God exists  He fucking hates me and wants me to be miserable until I either die from some awful disease or kill myself   Anyway  I called my order in and I went to go pick it up  I was wearing my work clothes  business casual  and facemask  I was in the store for maybe less than five minutes  Upon exiting  there was a group of teenage girls approaching the door  They looked like they were in their late teens or possibly early  s  and seemed like the popular type and wore a lot of make up  I held the door open for them and they all gave me the side eye  not even thanking me  When I let go of the door and started walking back to my car  I heard one of them go  ew  did you see her  The girl who held the door open  And they were all giggling   I fucking hate myself  Not even strangers are nice to me lmao damn
summary: A group of teenagers ridiculed me yesterday. Yesterday was payday for me and I always eat out on payday. I decided to get carry out from my favorite Shawarma place yesterday evening after picking up my medication. I was in the store for less than five minutes when a group of teenage girls approached the door. They all gave me the side eye not even thanking me.
